description: Agent-managed suggestions for tours and documentation

suggestions.title: Getting Started Tour
suggestions.description: Understand how this codebase is organized and where to begin
suggestions.prompt:
Create an Intraview tour to help a new developer get started with this codebase.

Analyze the repository structure and create a walkthrough that covers:
- The main entry point(s) and how the application/library starts
- Project structure and key directories
- Core patterns and conventions used
- How to run, build, and test the project
- Important configuration files

Adapt the tour based on what you discover - this could be a web app, library, CLI tool, or service.

suggestions.title: Architecture Overview
suggestions.description: Learn the high-level design and how components interact
suggestions.prompt:
Create an Intraview tour explaining this codebase's architecture.

Explore and document:
- High-level system design and main components
- How data flows through the system
- Key abstractions and patterns (MVC, event-driven, layered, etc.)
- Integration points (APIs, databases, external services) if present
- Design decisions that are evident from the code structure

Focus on helping developers understand the "big picture" before diving into details.

suggestions.title: Development Workflow
suggestions.description: Learn the toolchain, scripts, and development process
suggestions.prompt:
Create an Intraview tour covering the development workflow for this project.

Walk through:
- How to set up the development environment
- Build tools and scripts (package.json scripts, Makefile, etc.)
- Testing approach and how to run tests
- Linting, formatting, and code quality tools
- Development vs production configurations
- Common development tasks and commands

Help developers become productive quickly with the day-to-day workflow.

suggestions.title: Core Functionality Deep Dive
suggestions.description: Understand the main feature or purpose of this codebase
suggestions.prompt:
Create an Intraview tour exploring the core functionality of this codebase.

Identify and explain:
- What is the primary purpose of this project?
- Where is the main business logic or core algorithm?
- How does the key feature work end-to-end?
- Important functions, classes, or modules that drive the main functionality
- How would someone extend or modify the core behavior?

Focus on the "heart" of the codebase - what makes it do what it does.

suggestions.title: Dependencies & Integrations
suggestions.description: Learn about external services, APIs, and key dependencies
suggestions.prompt:
Create an Intraview tour covering dependencies and integrations in this codebase.

Explore:
- Key external dependencies and why they're used
- Integration points (REST APIs, GraphQL, databases, message queues, etc.)
- Authentication/authorization if present
- Configuration for external services
- How errors and failures from external systems are handled

Help developers understand what this system connects to and depends on.
